meanings.definition: The last or final part of something.
meanings.sent1: In the story, the hero reached the ultima moment where everything was resolved.
meanings.sent2: The ultima chapter of the book tied up all the loose ends.
meanings.sent3: At the ultima scene of the play, the characters finally found happiness.
meanings.sent4: The ultima piece of the puzzle completed the picture perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The ultima scene of the movie left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: The highest or most extreme point or degree.
meanings.sent1: Reaching the ultima level of excitement, the crowd erupted into cheers.
meanings.sent2: The mountain climber finally reached the ultima peak after a long journey.
meanings.sent3: The ultima flavor of the cake was a delightful surprise to everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her ultima speed on the track amazed all the spectators.
meanings.sent5: The ultima height of the roller coaster made everyone scream with excitement.

meanings.definition: The last syllable of a word.
meanings.sent1: Pronouncing the ultima of the word correctly is important for clear communication.
meanings.sent2: The ultima of the word 'elephant' is 'fant'.
meanings.sent3: The ultima of the word 'banana' sounds funny when said quickly.
meanings.sent4: The ultima of the word 'computer' is 'ter'.
meanings.sent5: The ultima of the word 'umbrella' is 'la'.
